column4: miro keeps crashing when loading. can anyone help? here's the output: http://pastebin.com/d49025c1a

prolly upgrading to gutsy
been a while since i've used it, but i think that's what did it
oh, yeah...
i tried reinstalling java & python. no go
I still don't know what to tell you outside of purging python and miro off your system and reinstalling both ...
heh, oh
didn't purge miro though...
well, you shouldn't realy have to
but, I would update your repos and see if there is one for gutsy (if you didn't already)
shouldn't be crashing either :P
just in case there is a difference between the feisty and the gutsy versions...
er, it's from the gutsy repo
or not... ha
it was installed originally as democracyplayer :P
hm, I dunna then...
see, I've had that installed before, but I manage to reinstall every 3-5 months due to hard drive failure, dropping my laptop, or a new version of ubuntu coming out... :P
yeh, i don't reinstall, i upgrade
yeah, thats what I was saying :)
I'm gonna get going, so hopefully you are on the right track or someone else can help you...
thx anyway
